mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (pro_detail_code, pro_code, pro_name, pro_detail, pro_price, pro_photo, pro_stock) VALUES (#{pro_detail_code}, #{pro_code}, #{pro_name}, #{pro_detail}, #{pro_price}, #{pro_photo}, #{pro_stock})
mapper.select: SELECT p.*, c.category_name FROM product p JOIN category c ON p.pro_code = c.pro_code ORDER BY p.pro_detail_code
